instructions: Tap the Settings app to open it, then tap Personal Hotspot . Tap Wi-Fi Password , then tap the X on the right side of the Password field to delete the current password. Enter a new password, then tap Done to save your changes. The password must be at least eight characters and can have uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and some punctuation marks. The main Personal Hotspot screen displays the new password. If you saved the old password on your other devices, update the hotspot password on those devices.

Open Settings , tap General , then tap About . Tap Name . On the next screen, tap the X to clear the current name, then enter a new name. Tap About (located in the upper-left corner) to return to the previous screen and save. Along with the hotspot, this name appears on iCloud backups and anywhere else you connect your phone.
